author: parithosh
content:
On hoodi, we currently have ~275k keys located on 3 physical hosts (they're really beefy machines). We're going to migrate away ~100k keys onto ~20 physical hosts to spread the keys out some more - the hope being that this should help make the attestation performance more realistic. 

Let us know if we shouldn't for some reason. There might be some variation (~10%) while we migrate the validator keys. We will log the time we start each process so that scripts can ignore variances.

cc <@586161934425128960> in case we mess with some analysis.
